The fails says:

> By default the Host Manager is only accessible from a browser running on the
    same machine as Tomcat. If you wish to modify this restriction, you'll need
    to edit the Host Manager's <tt>context.xml</tt> file.

See http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tomcat/tc8.5.x/trunk/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/jsp/403.jsp?view=markup#l36

This has been probably copied from the Host Manager but never chaned. It is enough to remove the word "Host".

Hi,

Thanks for the report.
This has been fixed in
- 9.0.x for 9.0.0.M10 onwards and
- 8.5.x for 8.5.5 onwards

Regards,
